ygData.subject: RE: boots
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a pair of Bear hide boots from Chanda Miller at the fire outside Surefall glade. They look like boots, good AC and not too heavy. I got them when I was
ygData.messageBody:
I have a pair of Bear hide boots from Chanda Miller at the fire outside
Surefall glade. They look like boots, good AC and not too heavy. I got them
when I was I think around 5th lvl.

At 04:06 PM 8/19/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Dizzy J." <dizzyj@...>
>
>is their a pair of boots that a lvl 14 can reasonably obtain, that will
>look like boots on the character? all this leather looking stuff, then
>little blue pumps kinda annoys me :)
>
>
>On Thu, 19 Aug 1999, Adam Hayek wrote:
>
>> From: Adam Hayek <Adam@...>
>>
>> I bought a pair of fur-lined slippers. they have a +7 agi boost, and
>> are low weight. I didnt get the kobold boots because of weight, which I
>> think is 2.5. However, i have no idea where those slippers came from.
>>
>> > >I would appreciate any tips you guys have on good boots and where to
>> > get them.
>> >
>> > Heh... I was stuck with Patchwork boots (leather weighed too
>> > much) until about level 27 when I finally got hold of some Kobold
>> > Hide Boots. I've gone through the equipment lists, and besides the
>> > Shiverback stuff, that's about as good as we're likely to get.
>> > (Possible exception of the JMan boots, but I'm not going for them
>> > because the AC sucks and they're one of the most heavily camped items
>> > in the game.)
>> >
>> > --
>> > Aaron Braunstein
>> > Pacific Data Management, Inc.
>> >
>> > <aaron_braunstein@...>
>> >
>> >
